house. We can't go there," Lily said.
But Ben did not listen. He ran to the gate and opened it. He saw a pool with blue water and a fountain. He was thirsty and wanted to drink some water.
He ran to the pool and leaned over the edge. But he slipped and fell into the water. He could not swim and he was scared. He shouted for help.
Lily heard him and ran to the pool. She saw Ben in the water and tried to reach him. But she was too small and the pool was too deep. She cried and called for help too.

Once upon a time, there was an ignorant clown. He wanted to have a party, so he set out looking for some friends. He went to the farm, but the animals said no. He went to the beach, but the fish said no. He even tried to ask his own shadow, but it said no too.
The clown

then, Jay heard a voice calling out, "Wait! Don't remove the banana!" Jay looked around and saw a kind old man, who was pointing up at the tree.
The old man said, "My friend, if you remove that banana now, you may be sorry later. See... surrounding the banana are a group of angry bees! Once you remove the banana, the bees will come after you. You must wait for them to go away first."
Jay listened to the wise old man and waited for the bees to leave. When all the bees were gone, Jay quickly removed the banana and ate it right away.
